usecases.title: Workspace task plan → changeset → tests → PR
usecases.description: Decompose an issue into steps, propose file changes, generate tests, and prepare a PR.
verification: All new changes have passing tests
example_prompts: Break this issue into steps, propose diffs, and generate corresponding tests.
Draft the PR description summarizing risks and mitigations.

usecases.title: PR-aware AI review & autofix suggestions
usecases.description: Review PRs for risks, missed tests, and offer inline fix-up patches.
verification: Add at least one negative test
example_prompts: Review this PR for concurrency and security issues.
Suggest minimal diffs to reduce complexity without changing behavior.

usecases.title: Repository knowledge Q&A over code + ADRs + docs
usecases.description: Answer natural-language questions grounded in source, ADRs, and READMEs.
example_prompts: Where is customer tiering logic defined?
Summarize ADRs that mention quotas and rate limits.

usecases.title: Copilot Edits: multi-hunk structured refactors
usecases.description: Apply instruction-driven, multi-file edits with consistent patterns.
example_prompts: Apply the repository-wide rename and update imports.
Extract this logic into a shared utility and update call sites.

usecases.title: Copilot for CLI: explain/fix shell commands
usecases.description: Suggest shell commands, explain failures, and propose safe corrections.
example_prompts: I ran this command and got an error; what went wrong and how do I fix it?
Propose a safe one-liner to tail logs and highlight 5xx.

usecases.title: Security autofix from scanner findings
usecases.description: Given SAST/DAST/IAST or IaC findings, suggest minimal safe diffs plus tests.
example_prompts: Given this Semgrep finding, propose a minimal safe fix and test.
Remediate hard-coded secret with secret manager integration.

usecases.title: Notebook-native DS/ML assistance
usecases.description: Explain cells, propose vectorized versions, and draft training/eval loops.
verification: Add unit tests for data transforms
example_prompts: Explain this cell and propose a faster Pandas equivalent.
Draft a PyTorch training loop skeleton with early stopping.

usecases.title: SRE incident triage & runbook Q&A
usecases.description: Query logs/alerts to identify blast radius, suggest probes and rollback plan.
example_prompts: From the last 30 minutes of error logs, where did 5xx start?
Draft a rollback checklist and a small probe to confirm recovery.

usecases.title: Expand boilerplate code snippets
usecases.description: Generate or expand boilerplate code snippets such as class templates, API clients, or common utility functions.
example_prompts: Generate a class template for a REST API client in Python.
anti_patterns: Generating incomplete or insecure boilerplate without review.

usecases.title: Automatic documentation creation
usecases.description: Automatically generate documentation comments or markdown files based on code or function signatures.
prerequisites: Code must have signatures or comments
example_prompts: Generate function docstrings for this Python file.

usecases.title: Code security audit assistance
usecases.description: Assist in auditing code for security vulnerabilities and suggest fixes.
example_prompts: Review this code for security vulnerabilities.

usecases.title: Assist Full Stack Developers in writing and reviewing code
usecases.description: Generate frontend and backend code snippets, automate testing, and support deployment scripts.
prerequisites: Knowledge of frontend and backend languages
example_prompts: Generate React components with backend API calls.
anti_patterns: Over-reliance on AI without manual integration testing.

usecases.title: Support Data Engineers in ETL pipelines and SQL optimizations
usecases.description: Help build, refactor, and optimize data pipelines and SQL queries with AI assistance.
prerequisites: Knowledge of SQL and Data Engineering
example_prompts: Optimize this Spark SQL query for performance.
anti_patterns: Blindly accepting generated queries without validation.

usecases.title: Assist QA Engineers in test case generation and bug reporting
usecases.description: Generate unit and integration tests automatically and summarize bug reports.
example_prompts: Generate Jest test cases for this React component.

usecases.title: Help ML Engineers with model code, data processing, and experiment logging
usecases.description: Generate ML pipeline code snippets, data preprocessors, and assist in experiment reproducibility.
example_prompts: Generate PyTorch data loader for this dataset.

usecases.title: Assist DevOps Engineers in CI/CD pipeline automation and monitoring
usecases.description: Generate configuration files, scripts, and monitoring alerts.
example_prompts: Generate GitHub Actions workflow for CI/CD.

usecases.title: Help Technical Writers generate and review documentation
usecases.description: Create user manuals, API references, and explain code behaviours.
example_prompts: Generate API reference for this module.
